workflow.name: 20-ocfs2
workflow.longdesc: Configure an OCFS2 filesystem, along with required dependencies (DLM). Note that the OCFS2 filesystem will be stopped initially, in case you need to run mkfs to create the filesystem after DLM is running.

template.name: filesystem
template.stepdesc: If an OCFS2 filesystem does not already exist on the block device specified here, you will need to run mkfs to create it, prior to starting the filesystem resource. You will also need to create the mountpoint directory on all cluster nodes.

workflow.crm_script: primitive dlm ocf:pacemaker:controld op start timeout="90" op stop timeout="100" op monitor interval="60" timeout="60" clone base-clone dlm meta interleave="true" clone c- meta interleave="true" target-role="Stopped" order base-then- inf: base-clone c- colocation -with-base inf: c- base-clone
